review: Overall we are pleased with the fire stick,but I like to look at Acorn tv and fire stick doesn't connect to them without extra payment.
author: Patricia L. Jensen "Patty Quilter"

review: Great device, gets me everything I need to turn my TV into a smart TV at a low cost and easy function. It was honestly plug in and its ready to go.
author: Zachary Zuzula

review: The Firestick outperforms my Chromecast and is easier to use. Outstanding product.
author: Duane S Borgeson

review: It will turn your regular TV into a smart TV which will save you money from buying an expensive smart TV. I love having access to all the apps but am a little disappointed that it doesn't have any movies or TV shows of its own that are free downloads. Other than that I love it.
author: NaNa

review: Easy to set up and use. I am loving it!
author: Deborah Termini

review: Love it. We now have three Fire TV devices.
author: Gina

review: Super functionality.  Heard it ws difficult to use the interface, but I had no problems at all, nor did my 6 year old granddaughter.
author: Dene Colwill

review: Very happy. All it said it would be
author: James Baumgardner
